Area 1 Security | Test Automation Engineer | Redwood City, CA | Full-time | ONSITE | https://area1security.com/about/careers/

Area 1 Security is looking for a Test Automation Engineer to join our growing automation team. We stop phishing attacks - 24/7 - for some of the largest organizations in the world, and need your help in building the most effective anti-phishing service imaginable. Direct link to posting: https://jobs.lever.co/area1security/43c6a834-17c2-40de-833a-...
